participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Jake loves exploring new trails and enjoys a good conversation over coffee.
participant_1.background: i don't drink alcohol. i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. my father was a construction worker. i hate the color pink. i'm a huge coffee lover.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and laid-back, Emily finds joy in the simple things, like spending time with her dog and coloring.
participant_2.background: i have a german shepherd dog. i live is a rural farming community. i enjoy coloring books. i like to watch nhl hockey.
